sex.Description: sex of the participant as reported by the participant

handedness.Description: handedness of the participant as reported by the participant

group.Description: experimental group the participant belonged to

Levels.feltinpresence: participants who felt in presence of their experimental partner during more than 50% of experiment
Levels.feltalone: participants who did not feel in presence of their experimental partner during more than 50% of experiment

MGF.Description: Score on the Mcgill Friendship questionnaire

Physical aggression Total.Description: Total score on the Buss-Perry Aggression Questionnaire

BPAQ Subset.Description: Score on the subset Physical Aggression of the Buss-Perry Aggression questionnaire

Levels.Friend: Participants were friends for at least 3 years
Levels.Romantic Partners: Participants were in a romantic relationship and have known each other for 3+ years

group.Additional Participant Info: Participant 6H1 and 7H1 were not included in this dataset (rejected for bad eeg)
